translation.en: Let's make that money.
What have you guys been eating?
Score!
Gah… this isn't what it looks like. I'm only here for your poop.
translation.es: No es lo que parece. Vine por el popó.

translation.en: [chuckles] I mean, I'm here for the mushrooms in your poop.
translation.es: Es decir, por los hongos en el popó.

translation.en: Yeah, that doesn't sound any better.
Catch!
Sorry I can't stay for dinner.
Come on, who throws somebody at somebody?
Whoa!
Large rats.
Dirty hands, filthy rich.
Hurry up, man. I can't do business until you deliver the goods.
translation.es: Vamos, no puedo trabajarsi no me das la mercancía.

translation.en: Tyson, you're in for a treat, you lucky wizard.
translation.es: Tyson, te traje algo especial,mago afortunado.

translation.en: Freshly tracked. Ah, it better be.
My dupe spell is useless without multiplying mushrooms.
translation.es: Mi hechizo no sirvesin hongos que se multiplican.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's the good stuff right there.
Hurry up, man. You don't wanna get busted for doing magic in public.
translation.es: Vamos, te atraparánpor usar magia en público.

translation.en: One more second.
All right! Double your pleasure.
You, get to Tribeca.
You, Soho.
And get my money back before you disappear this time!
translation.es: Y denme el dinero antes de desaparecer.

translation.en: Oh, look at this little guy.
How's about a mini-dog, Spellbound? On the house.
Uh… I don't eat magic.
You may be half-sized, but you charge full price. You hear me?
translation.es: Eres pequeño, pero cobra a lo grande. ¿Entendido?

translation.en: Getting partners was the best business decision I ever made.
translation.es: Conseguir sociosfue mi mejor decisión comercial.

translation.en: You got someone watching your back, kid?
Ha! You volunteering?
Nah, I'm not trying to buddy up with somebody on the wrong side of The Pie Maker.
translation.es: No, no quiero enfrentarme a la Pastelera.

translation.en: Who cares about that old witch?
Her bakers are searching for you, kid.
She wants you that bad, you must've really screwed up tracking something for her.
translation.es: Para buscarte así,debiste haber metido mucho la pata.

translation.en: It's fine. I'm close to finding a Fugu Rose.
translation.es: Descuida. Estoy cerca de hallaruna Rosa de Fugu.

translation.en: Whoa. That rose is worth serious money, kid.
translation.es: Vaya. La Rosa vale mucho dinero, niño.

translation.en: You found one?
I just need help to track the last step.
translation.es: Necesito ayuda con el último paso.

translation.en: Once I get that, ha! All my debts are cleared and I'm set.
translation.es: Cuando la tenga, saldaré todas mis deudas.

translation.en: Yeah, except you'll still be stinky, friendless, and, oh yeah, not magic.
translation.es: Sí, pero aún serás apestosoy seguirás sin tener amigos ni magia.

translation.en: Hygiene's a scam, friends are a scam, and, oh yeah, magic is a scam.
translation.es: La higiene es una estafa,al igual que los amigos y la magia.

translation.en: Call it what you want, kid, but my magic buddies are making me rich.
translation.es: Lo que digas,pero mis amigos mágicos me hacen rico.

translation.en: Hey-hey, guys.
I was just on my way to see you--
Hey, where were you?
You see that little hot dog guy down the block?
You have to try one of his dogs.
-[grunts] -[baker] We searched. No magic on him.
translation.es: Ya lo revisamos. No trae magia.

translation.en: Daniel, my boy.
I always forget how cute your place is, Pie Maker.
translation.es: Siempre olvidoqué lindo es tu local, Pastelera.

translation.en: The pies, the… curtains,
the cyclops henchmen.
I didn't become the most wicked witch of New York
translation.es: No sería la brujamás malvada de Nueva York

translation.en: by having low-life spell Trackers fail me.
My clients expect the best magical ingredients.
Ingredients you were supposed to deliver.
Where are my gnome whiskers?
I was gonna get them to you, I swear! But the Bureau sicced a dowser on me, I had to ditch 'em.
translation.es: Iba a traerlos, pero debí huirde un Cazador de la Oficina.

translation.en: I have a plan.
The magic world knows my pies have the most dangerous ingredients.
translation.es: El mundo mágico sabe que mis pastelestienen los ingredientes más peligrosos.

translation.en: Ingredients you promised to find me and failed.
translation.es: Ingredientes que prometiste hallary me fallaste.

translation.en: That's fair, but I'm tracking something big for you.
translation.es: Sí, pero rastreo algo grande para ti.

translation.en: Yes, for me, because you owe me.
translation.es: Sí, para mí, porque me lo debes.

translation.en: You're my Tracker now.
You will do nothing
but find every little illegal ingredient I need for my magic pies.
translation.es: Buscarás todos los ingredientes ilegales que necesite para mis pasteles mágicos.

translation.en: I told you, the Bureau heat on me has been intense, but when I can track again, I'll make it up to you.
translation.es: La Oficina quiere cazarme.Lo compensaré cuando pueda rastrear.

translation.en: It's all about you.
Uh-uh-uh. You're not telling me the truth.
I haven't done any tracking at all, I swear.
Bring out…
…The Beast.
Ah… a pig?
Hey! Come on.
[giggling] Get this thing off of me. It tickles, but in a scary way.
translation.es: Quítenmelo de encima.Me hace cosquillas, pero da miedo.

translation.en: [Pie Maker] Don't struggle.
The pig sniffer is powerful enough to sense any magic from a hundred yards away.
translation.es: Los cerdos pueden olfatear magiaa cien metros de distancia.

translation.en: Hey, what the--
Ogre mushrooms.
Fresh.
Impressive work.
Get his eye-patch ready.
This isn't necessary!
Now, which are you, Daniel?
A heart? Oh, no, no, no.
You clearly think you're a star.
I could get you a Fugu Rose!
Impossible. No one's seen a Fugu Rose in years.
translation.es: Imposible. Hace añosque nadie ve una Rosa de Fugu.

translation.en: They're priceless.
I know where one is.
My best Trackers couldn't do that. No way you could, silly boy.
translation.es: Mis mejores Rastreadores no lo saben.Menos lo sabes tú, tonto.

translation.en: Give me 24 hours and it's yours, if you erase all my debt.
translation.es: Dame 24 horas y es tuya,si cancelas mi deuda.

translation.en: Well, dear, we have a deal.
[Pie Maker] You better not disappoint me again,
because you won't like what this spell will do to you.
translation.es: No te gustará lo que te hará este hechizo.

translation.en: Not one bit.
Great. Heh. You'll be seeing me soon.
There is still the little matter of you lying to me, though.
translation.es: No tan rápido.Debes pagar por haberme mentido.

translation.en: -Wait! We have a deal. -[Pie Maker chuckles evilly]
My dear,
you can still find the Rose with one eye.
translation.es: puedes encontrar la Rosa con un solo ojo.

translation.en: No! That activates the oven to full power.
translation.es: ¡No! El horno estará a máxima potencia.

translation.en: Turn off the oven, you buffoon!
Ha! What are you doing?
[Daniel] You're just the kind of help I've been looking for.
See you lovebirds in 24 hours. [Pie Maker] I'll take both your eyes for that!
translation.es: - Nos vemos en 24 horas, tórtolos.- ¡Te quitaré los dos ojos!

translation.en: -[tires screeching] -Whoa, hey!
Gotta catch my breath.
-You said it. -[screams]
Did you just talk?
Hey, thanks for saving my bacon, man. She is awful. She has a place full of food, never gives me a crumb.
translation.es: Gracias por salvarme. Es malísima.Le sobra comida y no me da nada.

translation.en: So, you smell magic and talk.
translation.es: Así que hueles magia y hablas.

translation.en: Any other tricks I should know about? You turn into a car or something?
Oh, you done it now. How did you know I turn into a car?
I'm just playing. I can't turn into a car. That'd be stupid.
translation.es: Es broma. No me convierto en auto. Qué estupidez.

translation.en: You're stupid. Aw, it's a little bit endearing, though.
Well, thanks again, I owe you. All right. I'm out. Peace.
translation.es: Gracias de nuevo, te debo una.Muy bien, me voy. Paz.

translation.en: Throwing up a, "Peace, I'm out" sign, you just can't tell 'cause I have a hoof.
translation.es: Hago la señal de la paz,no se nota porque tengo pezuña.

translation.en: Uh-huh. You do owe me.
And I have a way you can repay me right now.
translation.es: Y me puedes pagar ya mismo.

translation.en: I-I-I-I-I'm not going anywhere with any magician ever again.
translation.es: No volveré a ir a ningún ladocon ningún mago.

translation.en: Oh, well, you're in luck. I'm not a magician, I'm a Tracker.
translation.es: Pues, estás de suerte.No soy mago, soy Rastreador.

translation.en: -I just sell magical ingredients. -Uh-huh. Cool story, bruh.
Wait, I know where a Fugu Rose is-- Ish.
translation.es: Sé dónde hay una Rosa de Fugu. Algo así.

translation.en: I don't know exactly where, so I need your magic smelling skills to get me to the finish.
translation.es: No sé dónde exactamente.Necesito tu olfato mágico.

translation.en: Pie Maker wanted to take your eye before you wrecked her shop, what'd you think she's gonna want now? A spleen?
translation.es: La Pastelera quería quitarte un ojo antes.¿Qué querrá ahora? ¿Un bazo?

translation.en: Oh, please. She'll be so happy when she gets the Rose, she won't even care. The Rose'll clear all my debts to her, and then some.
translation.es: Estará tan feliz que no le importará.La Rosa saldará todas mis deudas y más.

translation.en: So, you'll walk away.
Oh, good for you. What's in it for me?
If you help me get this Rose, I promise I won't give it to her unless she sets you free.
translation.es: Si me ayudas a hallar la Rosa,no se lo daré a menos que te libere.

translation.en: Out on my own. Love it. What else?
We can get pizza on the way.
[chuckling] Yes, I am very in.
Here, just hoof-pump it, bruh.
What do I call you anyways? Piggy?
Oh, I get it. "Piggy." Because I'm a pig. Because all pigs look alike to you.
translation.es: Claro, "Cerdito" porque soy un cerdoy todos somos iguales.

translation.en: My name is Hoagie. Not "Pig," not "Piggy," not "Oinkie," just "Hoagie."
Hoagie, I was kidding.
[Hoagie] Just for that "Piggy" crack, I'm gonna pick the pizza.
translation.es: Bien, por el chiste de "Cerdito",yo elegiré la pizza.

translation.en: [Daniel, munching] Oh!
Good call on the veggie pizza.
Yeah, I don't know what it is,
but I just don't feel right eating pepperoni anymore.
translation.es: pero ya no puedo comer peperoni.

translation.en: What's the deal with this Albright place?
I've tracked the Fugu Rose for a long time. The search led me here.
translation.es: Rastreo la Rosa hace tiempo y llegué aquí.

translation.en: A soap factory. It's more than a soap factory.
translation.es: - Una fábrica de jabón.- Es más que eso.

translation.en: I've snuck a bunch of times. It's in there. Somewhere.
translation.es: Entré varias veces. Sé que está ahí.

translation.en: How do you know that? You don't have my nose for this.
translation.es: ¿Cómo lo sabes? No tienes mi olfato.

translation.en: It's called planning, dummy.
Oh, look at me.
I got my hands so I can type and Wiki stuff and think I'm sooo great.
translation.es: Tengo manos, puedo tipear,leer cosas en Wikipedia, soy genial.

translation.en: Hoagie, keep quiet and stay loose. Loose? What do you mean?
translation.es: - Cállate y prepárate a volar.- ¿A volar? ¿Qué?

translation.en: Whoa, dude, that is not cool. I'm already down an eye, you trying to break a leg too?
translation.es: Eso no está nada bien. Perdí un ojo,¿quieres quebrarme una pata?

translation.en: [Daniel sighs] I did say stay loose.
[Hoagie] So sorry, I haven't exactly been keeping up with my yoga.
translation.es: Lo siento, no practico caída libre.

translation.en: There's magic all over the place in here,
translation.es: Hay magia por todos lados aquí,

translation.en: but I'm getting one really strong scent.
translation.es: pero percibo un olor muy fuerte.

translation.en: [Daniel] I knew it. It's this lab, right?
No, the strongest whiff of magic is…
translation.es: No, el olor a magia más fuerte está…

translation.en: There! Ta-da!
Oh, great, you're defective.
I literally just fed you.
Because I'm a pig. Because pigs love to eat.
translation.es: Porque soy un cerdo y adoramos comer.

translation.en: The alchemist triad? Bingo.
I wonder what it could be.
Not that one either.
Are you sure you did it right?
Uh… I don't even think there's any kind of magic in here. This is nothing but a dusty old vending machine.
translation.es: No creo que tenga magia.Es una vieja máquina expendedora.

translation.en: My nose doesn't lie.
Your nose is just trying to get a free Twinkie.
Oh, I see. That's how it's gonna be.
[Daniel] I'll give 'em credit.
This was a great hiding place.
Oh, this room reeks of magic.
It's itching the inside of my brain.
translation.es: Me pica el interior del cerebro.

translation.en: Get it together, Hoagie. We're on the clock. Only a few hours until my deal runs out.
translation.es: Contrólate, no hay tiempo.Mi trato se acaba en unas horas.

translation.en: Hoagie?
Where'd you go?
[in evil voice] There is no Hoagie, only King of the Squid People.
translation.es: Hoagie no existe,solo el Rey de los Calamares.

translation.en: Do squid things for me.
Get down off the tentacore.
Chill. I'm just having a little fun.
I'll chill when we get the Rose. -Don't touch anything. -Hmm.
translation.es: Me calmaré cuando tengamos la Rosa.No toques nada.

translation.en: There's no telling what's magically booby-trapped in here.
[gasps] There it is.
That's the Fugu Rose? Just grab some flowers and split.
translation.es: ¿Esa es la Rosa de Fugu?Tomemos unas y vamos.

translation.en: This whole place was built around this to protect it.
Does that give you any idea of how powerful it is?
One rose on this bush can be used to extend life by decades,
translation.es: Una de este arbustoextiende la vida por décadas,

translation.en: but touching any of the others brings instant, painful death.
translation.es: pero si tocas cualquier otra,mueres al instante con dolor.

translation.en: Oh, I get your plan now. You mistook me for a guinea pig.
translation.es: Ahora entiendo tu plan.Me crees un conejillo de indias.

translation.en: -No, I-- -[squeals]
[screaming] A little help!
Hoagie!
This is why you don't touch anything.
translation.es: Por esto es no hay que tocar nada.

translation.en: Oh, no. I'm too young to become pepperoni!
translation.es: No, soy muy joven para ser peperoni.

translation.en: Immune to stun spells. That's real--
translation.es: Es inmune a los hechizos. Qué…

translation.en: Score!
Let's get that rose and get out.
Heaven help me, it tastes so good!
-Hoagie… get me… the sword… now. -[thumping]
-[thumping continues] -This… genuinely… hurts.
[Hoagie] I've got the sword!
Daniel! You want me? Come and get me, land sushi.
Oh, man, did you just touch that rose?
Oh, I bet you're feeling stupid now.
Daniel! Tell me you're okay.
Didn't I say not to touch anything?! You almost got me killed!
translation.es: ¿No te dije que no tocaras nada?Casi me matan por tu culpa.

translation.en: No, I saved you.
From a thing you brought to life with your touching!
translation.es: De algo que tú creaste por tocar cosas

translation.en: Now I'm drenched in walking fish guts.
translation.es: Estoy lleno de tripas de pescado.

translation.en: -Pfft. You're still alive. -[sighs]
You want this rose or not? Because I know which one to definitely not touch.
translation.es: ¿Quieres la Rosa o no?Porque sé cuál no tocar.

translation.en: Tell me the right one to pick. I'm trying. I'm a little fired up right now.
translation.es: - Dime cuál es la indicada.- Eso intento, estoy nervioso.

translation.en: I'm not used to facing death so many times in one day.
translation.es: No suelo enfrentarme tanto a la muerte.

translation.en: Yes!
Best Tracker alive.
Man, I was like 65% sure I was right. Thank goodness.
translation.es: Estaba un 65 % segurode que era esa. Gracias a Dios.

translation.en: Wait, what?
Uh, those were decent odds. Just take the victory lap and be happy.
translation.es: Era un buen porcentaje. Alégrate y ya.

translation.en: Come on, I got you.
Alley-oop.
-Thanks. -Good work, man.
What do you think about hanging around?
We make an okay team, yeah?
Oh, so I can help you make money off of my power. What an offer.
translation.es: Y ganarás dinero con mi poder.Gran oferta.

translation.en: Where are you gonna go?
You're a magic talking pig. The normal world won't know what to do with you.
translation.es: Eres un cerdo mágico que habla.No sabrán qué hacer contigo.

translation.en: Thanks. I'll take my chances.
Lots of better jobs out there for a pig than being your nose servant.
translation.es: Hay mejores trabajosque ser tu olfateador.

translation.en: Hoagie, you're right. We can make money.
Together. Split it 50/50. Watch each other's backs. What'd you say?
translation.es: Juntos. La mitad para cada uno.Nos ayudaremos. ¿Qué dices?

translation.en: Now you're talking. All right. I'm in.
translation.es: Ahora sí. Está bien, de acuerdo.

translation.en: Dowsers. Run for it!
I swear I never touched anything.
[female dowser] By order of the Bureau of Magical Enforcement,
translation.es: Por ordende la Oficina de Aplicación Mágica,

translation.en: you are both under arrest.
I do not know this guy.
We are not together.
Thanks.
